tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE network_performance_metrics (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  metric_name VARCHAR(50),
  metric_value DOUBLE,
  device_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE network_metrics (
    metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    device_id INT,
    metric_name VARCHAR(50),
    metric_value FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE anomaly_events (
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    description TEXT,
    severity VARCHAR(20),
    device_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE network_devices (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR(255),
    ip_address VARCHAR(15),
    location VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE metrics_data (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    metric_name VARCHAR(50),
    metric_value FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE alerts (
    alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    alert_message TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE anomalies (
    anomaly_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    anomaly_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE network_metrics (
  metric_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  metric_name STRING,
  device_id UUID REFERENCES network_devices(device_id),
  metric_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  metric_value FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE anomaly_detection (
  event_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  metric_id UUID REFERENCES network_metrics(metric_id),
  anomaly_type STRING,
  event_description TEXT,
  event_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE troubleshooting_logs (
  log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  event_id UUID REFERENCES anomaly_detection(event_id),
  log_level STRING,
  log_message TEXT,
  log_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE user_activity (
  user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  username STRING,
  activity_type STRING,
  activity_description TEXT,
  activity_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
